page.title: 05Quemerford Gate Farm
page.content:
My family, the Candys, have lived in {Quemerford Gate Farm}for ten years. We farm 40 acres of pasture land some of which is cut for silage.
We raise 160{Hereford Cross beef {cattle,}have 40{hens}and 7{pigs.}The pigs will soon be sent for slaughter. Steers and heifers cost between Â£320 and Â£420 each.
My father has 3 men working for him on the farm. We have four tractors, a combine harvester, 2 ploughs, 2 rollers, a muck spreader and several other implements. A new "John Deere" tractor costs about Â£22000.
I like living on a farm because I like helping with the cattle, driving tractors and having lots of space to play in.
